statements: SELECT * FROM 3d_printing_failures;
SELECT failure_reason, failure_date FROM 3d_printing_failures WHERE printer_model = 'ModelA';
SELECT print_id, printer_model FROM 3d_printing_failures WHERE failure_reason = 'Filament Jam';
SELECT * FROM 3d_printing_failures WHERE failure_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT failure_reason, COUNT(print_id) AS total_failures FROM 3d_printing_failures GROUP BY failure_reason ORDER BY total_failures DESC;
SELECT * FROM 3d_printing_failures WHERE failure_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT printer_model, COUNT(print_id) AS total_prints FROM 3d_printing_failures GROUP BY printer_model ORDER BY total_prints DESC;
SELECT failure_date, failure_reason FROM 3d_printing_failures WHERE failure_reason LIKE '%clogged nozzle%' ORDER BY failure_date DESC;
SELECT printer_model, AVG(LENGTH(filaments_used)) AS avg_filament_length FROM 3d_printing_failures GROUP BY printer_model HAVING AVG(LENGTH(filaments_used)) > 50;
SELECT * FROM 3d_printing_failures WHERE failure_reason IN ('filament jam', 'layer shifting') AND printer_model = 'Prusa i3 MK3';
SELECT id, failure_type, failure_date, failure_details FROM printing_failures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM printing_failures WHERE failure_type = 'Jamming' ORDER BY failure_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer, production_year FROM printer_models WHERE manufacturer = 'Epson';
SELECT * FROM printer_models ORDER BY production_year ASC;
SELECT id, failure_type FROM printing_failures WHERE failure_date >= '2022-01-01' AND failure_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, failure_type, failure_date, failure_details FROM printing_failures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM printing_failures WHERE failure_type = 'Paper Jam' AND failure_details LIKE '%error%';
SELECT model_id, model_name, manufacturer FROM printer_models WHERE manufacturer = 'HP';
SELECT failure_type, COUNT(*) FROM printing_failures GROUP BY failure_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM printing_failures WHERE failure_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';
SELECT * FROM three_d_printing_failures;
SELECT failure_id, failure_date, failure_type FROM three_d_printing_failures WHERE failure_type = 'Print Error';
SELECT machine_name, machine_location FROM printing_machines ORDER BY machine_location DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials_used WHERE material_type = 'Filament' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM three_d_printing_failures WHERE failure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM three_d_printing_failures ORDER BY failure_date DESC;
SELECT failure_type, failure_description FROM three_d_printing_failures WHERE failure_type='Hardware Issue' AND failure_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT failure_date, failure_type, failure_description FROM three_d_printing_failures WHERE failure_type='Software Issue' ORDER BY failure_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM materials_used WHERE material_type='Plastic' AND material_supplier='ABC Plastics' ORDER BY material_name;
SELECT machine_name, machine_location FROM printing_machines WHERE machine_type='Industrial' AND machine_location='Factory A';
SELECT * FROM printing_failures;
SELECT id, failure_type FROM printing_failures WHERE failure_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT failure_description, failure_type FROM printing_failures WHERE failure_type = 'Mechanical';
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM printer_models ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, failure_rate FROM material_failures WHERE failure_severity > 5 ORDER BY failure_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM printing_failures ORDER BY failure_date DESC;
SELECT failure_type, failure_description FROM printing_failures WHERE failure_type = 'ink_failure';
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM printer_models WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT material_name, failure_severity FROM material_failures WHERE failure_severity > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM printing_failures;
SELECT date, failure_type FROM printing_failures WHERE failure_type='Paper Jam';
SELECT printer_name, purchase_date FROM printers ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT job_id, start_time, end_time FROM print_jobs WHERE end_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM printer_models WHERE release_year < 2010;
SELECT * FROM printing_failures WHERE failure_type = 'Paper Jam'
SELECT printer_name, model_name, purchase_date FROM printers INNER JOIN printer_models ON printers.model_id = printer_models.model_id WHERE printer_location = 'Room A'
SELECT material_name, material_type, supplier FROM print_materials ORDER BY material_type ASC
SELECT printer_name, purchase_date FROM printers WHERE model_id IN (SELECT model_id FROM printer_models WHERE manufacturer = 'HP')
SELECT printer_name, model_name, start_time, end_time FROM printers INNER JOIN print_jobs ON printers.printer_id = print_jobs.printer_id WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
